    Master’s student (Jiangnan University; co-advised at ICT, CAS). Research on ML for compiler optimization, binary analysis, AI compilers, and code optimization.

    About

    Master’s student at Jiangnan University (co-advised at the ICT, CAS).
    My interests include ML for compiler optimization, binary analysis, AI compilers, and code optimization.
    Actively looking to push optimization research into production compilers.

    🎓 Education

    • BEng in Computer Science — Jiangsu University · 2019–2023
    • MEng in Artificial Intelligence — Jiangnan University · 2023–2026 Rank 1st
    • Visiting Master’s Student — ICT, CAS · 2024–Now

    🧩 Selected Projects

    • Team Lead Haskell Compiler (GHC) for Sunway (2023.09–2024.07)
    • A Major Project (Contributor, 2024.08–Present)
